about_the_game:
Game System

"Melt Away" is a traditional linear visual novel. Click on the screen to advance through the story.

It features beautiful watercolor-style illustrations and a huge amount of imagery.

Everything is geared towards enjoying the story to the fullest.

There are no branching paths, and all resources are poured into "narrating" the story. Beautiful and extensive graphics, along with delicate music, maximize the charm of the story. Enjoy a supreme storytelling experience.

Story

In a stark white hospital room, she is playing the piano.

I thought of her vibrant rhythm as freedom.

Before I knew it, I started going to the hospital, gradually becoming attracted to her.

Days of the ensuing summer.

Yet, I had forgotten.

Something very important.

The fact that happy everyday life does not last forever.

That it can be abruptly shattered by the sudden appearance of something invisible.

"Hey, I might die soon."
